Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka and West Indies will lock horns in the 3rd ODI of West Indies tour of Sri Lanka 2024 on Saturday, 26 October 2024, at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy.
The match will be broadcast on Sony Network and live-streamed on Sony LIV.
The weather forecast for the match is overcast with a temperature of 29°C.
The pitch is expected to be batting-friendly with an average first innings score of 280, suitable for both pace and spin.

Predicted Playing XIs for Sri Lanka: Nishan Madushka, Avishka Fernando, Kusal Mendis (WK), Kamindu Mendis, Charith Asalanka, Sadeera Samarawickrama, Janith Liyanage, Wanindu Hasaranga, Dunith Wellalage, Jeffrey Vandersay, Asitha Fernando.

Predicted Playing XIs for West Indies: Brandon King, Alick Athanaze, Shai Hope (WK/C), Keacy Carty, Roston Chase, Sherfane Rutherford, Romario Shepherd, Gudakesh Motie, Hayden Walsh, Jayden Seales, Alzarri Joseph.
